long_description: we are rajkot based iso 9001: 2015 certified manufacturing company, manufacturer of plastic injection molding machines. established in 1993, gec offers today the full range of injection moulding machines from 50 ton to 850 ton with capacity to manufacture 500 machines per annum and steadily spreading our network & services in domestic & international market. ghanshyam engineering company - india constantly strives to offer its plastics injection moulding machine customers innovative solutions to keep them ahead in this competitive arena. product development is a continuous process to assist customers in reducing their overall cost of product & energy consumption and thereby increasing their productivity, reliability & competitiveness.

company_legal_names: ghanshyam engg. co. | ghanshyam engineering company
long_description: ghanshyam engineering company (gec) is engaged in the manufacturing and exporting of premium quality plastic injection molding machines in india. our journey started way back in the year 1993 with the manufacturing of vertical plunger type machines. our vision is to be in the list of the top rated injection molding machine manufacturers company in the world. to exceed our customers expectations in quality, delivery and cost through continuous improvement and customer interaction. ghanshyam engineering's strongly founded on pillars of integrity, quality, innovation and customer service. after developing the first plastic injection molding machine for their organization, his self inspiration for endurance in the market prompts exploration and development in minimal and practical plans. as a strategic planning and customer relationships expert, he significantly provides values for all the business procedures. kashyap has expertise in team building strategy and communication strategy. harshad patel is one of the main pillars of gec.

generated_description: ghanshyam engineering, legally known as ghanshyam engineering company, based in rajkot, gujarat, is a manufacturer and exporter of premium quality plastic injection molding machines. established in 1993, the company specializes in producing a wide range of machines including toggle type, ram type, vertical injection molding, and sprinkler injection molding. ghanshyam engineering company is iso certified and focuses on providing high-quality products and excellent customer service. the company's infrastructure includes various subunits for quality assurance, sales and marketing, administration, r&d, production, and logistics warehousing. the company serves multiple industries such as household and furniture, consumer goods, medical, electrical, toys, agriculture, and automobile sectors.

long_description: at ghanshyam engineering company, we engineer innovative solutions for the plastic injection molding industry. with 30 years of experience, we specialize in the design, manufacture, and servicing of high-quality, customized machines that offer exceptional precision and performance with range of 50 ton to 650 ton. our team of highly skilled engineers, state-of-the-art facilities, and dedication to customer service enable us to provide tailored solutions that meet the unique needs of our clients. we're passionate about what we do and take pride in our reputation for excellence with certification of iso 9001:2018.
